verses.verse: Awake <S%H5782><s%>, <S%H5782>awake<s%>, put <S%H3847>on<s%> thy <S%H5797>strength<s%>, O <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; put <S%H3847>on<s%> thy <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>: for henceforth there shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into thee the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> and the <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

Shake <S%H5287><s%> thyself from the <S%H6083>dust<s%>; <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H3427>sit<s%> on thy <S%H3389>throne<s%>, O Jerusalem: <S%H6605>loose<s%> thyself from the <S%H4147>bonds<s%> of thy <S%H6677>neck<s%>, O <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Ye were <S%H4376>sold<s%> for <S%H2600>nought<s%>; and ye shall be <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> without <S%H3701>money<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>, My <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H804>there<s%>: and the Assyrian hath <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> them without <S%H657>cause<s%>.

Now <S%H5002>therefore<s%>, what do I here, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, seeing that my <S%H5971>people<s%> is taken <S%H3947>away<s%> for <S%H2600>nought<s%>? they that <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them do <S%H3213>howl<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H5006>blasphemed<s%>.
Therefore my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%>: therefore they shall know in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that I am he that doth <S%H1696>speak<s%>; behold, it is I.

How <S%H4998>beautiful<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of him that bringeth good <S%H1319>tidings<s%>, that <S%H8085>publisheth<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, that bringeth good <S%H1319>tidings<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%>, that <S%H8085>publisheth<s%> <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, that <S%H559>saith<s%> unto <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, Thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth<s%>!

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thy <S%H6822>watchmen<s%>! they lift <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%>, <S%H3162>together<s%> do they <S%H7442>sing<s%>; for they shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> to <S%H5869>eye<s%>, when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7725>returneth<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

Break forth into <S%H6476>joy<s%>, <S%H7442>sing<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, ye waste <S%H2723>places<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5162>comforted<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, he hath <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H2834>bare<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; and all the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>.

Depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H5493>ye<s%>, depart <S%H3318>ye<s%>, go ye out from <S%H5060>thence<s%>, touch no <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H3318>thing<s%>; go ye out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H1305>her<s%>; cleanse <S%H5375>yourselves<s%>, ye that bear the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

For ye shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> in <S%H2649>haste<s%>, neither shall ye <S%H1980>go<s%> by <S%H4499>flight<s%>: for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>you<s%>; and the God of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be your <S%H622>rearward<s%>.
Behold <S%H5650><s%>, my servant shall deal <S%H7919>wisely<s%>, he shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> <S%H3966>up<s%>, and shall be very <S%H1361>high<s%>.

Like as <S%H7227>many<s%> were <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at <S%H4758>thee<s%> (his visage was so <S%H4893>marred<s%> more than any <S%H376>man<s%>, and his <S%H8389>form<s%> more than the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>),

so shall he <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>; <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H7092>shut<s%> their <S%H6310>mouths<s%> at <S%H5608>him<s%>: for that which had not been told them shall they <S%H7200>see<s%>; and that which they had not <S%H8085>heard<s%> shall they <S%H995>understand<s%>.
